about_the_game:
Aimed at all the senses you feel in an old supercar excluding the smell of 100 octane seeping into the cabin from the rear engine bay. Immerse yourself in the sights and sounds of speed.




Dynamic worlds every game with fresh changing atmospheres for you to relax in and enjoy. With an awesome soundtrack making you remember memories you never had.



This game is a passion project developed by a solo developer. You can reach out to me on Steam Community Discussions or Discord and share your opinions, I listen to your feedback.

SYNTHALGIA is a love letter to the 1980’s. Everything nostalgic and retro - concentrated into one sweet package. You get to experience it by driving through the dynamic and colourful changing worlds, behind the wheel of the ultimate 1980s poster cars.

Inspired by the golden era of coin operated and home console arcade racing games - it's beautiful, relaxing and easy to pick up and play, taking you back in time every once in a while.

Drive dangerously and drive fast, as long and as far as you can to rank up, unlock new items, roads and top the highscore boards!




Wishlist today! It's a beautiful game and wishlisting is 100% free. If you wishlist you will get notified on launch day when the game comes out! Wishlists are also the fuel of a one man studio, they are very encouraging. I appreciate your support more than you can imagine.

name: SYNTHALGIA: Retro Arcade Racing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4570 OR Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 OR Radeon RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3770 OR Equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 OR Radeon RX 5600XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: In SYNTHALGIA you drive 1980s supercars through retrofuturisitc worlds. Crash, explode, refuel, repaint, repair and upgrade. Fast paced and straight forward intense arcade action in synthwave nostalgia!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Bulgarian
*languages with full audio support
